New Records: Quinton de Kock hit the highest individual score of the tournament so far with 174
Quinton de Kock became the tournament's leading run-scorer
Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock smashed 174 from 140 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Quinton de Kock expressed determination to make his farewell a memorable one
South Africa secured a spot in the semi-finals of the Cricket World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa plundered 144 runs from the last 10 overs
Marco Jansen removed two key batters for Bangladesh
